text.0: with worship will i glorify thee agni like a longtailed steed.
text.2: may the farstriding son of strength bringer of great felicity.
text.3: who pours his gifts like rain be ours.
text.4: lord of all life from near from far do thou o agni evermore.
text.5: protect us from the sinful man.
text.6: o agni graciously announce this our oblation to the gods.
text.7: and this our newest song of praise.
text.8: give us a share of strength most high a share of strength that is below.
text.9: a share of strength that is between.
text.10: thou dealest gifts resplendent one nigh as with waves of sindhu thou.
text.12: that man is lord of endless strength whom thou protectest in the fight.
text.13: agni or urgest to the fray.
text.14: him whosoever he may be no man may vanquish mighty one.
text.15: nay very glorious power is his.
text.16: may he who dwells with all mankind bear us with warsteeds through the fight.
text.17: and with the singers win the spoil.
text.18: help thou who knowest lauds this work this eulogy to rudra him.
text.20: may this our god great limitless smokebannered excellently bright.
text.21: urge us to strength and holy thought.
text.22: like some rich lord of men may he agni the banner of the gods.
text.23: refulgent hear us through our lauds.
text.24: glory to gods the mighty and the lesser glory to gods the younger and the elder.
text.25: let us if we have power pay the god worship no better prayer than this ye gods acknowledge.
